articles.author: Stacy Liberatore, Jonathan Chadwick
articles.title: NASA declares Insight DEAD after two failed communication attempts - Daily Mail
articles.description: NASA has officially ended its Insight mission on Mars following four years of exploration. The lander has not contacted Earth since December 15 and did not respond to two communication attempts.
articles.content:
NASA has bid farewell to Insight after more than four years of service.
Mission controller announced the demise of the Mars lander Wednesday after two failed attempts to contact the craft.
The team… [+5301 chars]

articles.title: Inheritance of paternal DNA damage by histone-mediated repair restriction - Nature.com
articles.description: In Caenorhabditis elegans, paternal exposure to ionizing radiation results in HIS-24 and HPL-1-dependent genome instability phenotypes, causing embryonic lethality in the offspring.
articles.content:
C. elegans strains

articles.title: Europe's Vega rocket crashes back to Earth - BBC
articles.description: Europe's premier small rocket fails in flight again - the third time in eight outings.
articles.content:
Europe's premier small rocket has failed in flight once again.
The Vega vehicle was lost 2.5 minutes into its latest mission from the Kourou spaceport in French Guiana.

articles.title: Scientists uncover first record of a dinosaur eating a mammal in fossil from 120 million years ago - Sky News
articles.content:
